root.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 3
root.description: OverviewDynasty Warriors: Gundam 3 is the third Gundam-themed offshoot of Koei's Musou franchise. The game features characters and mobile suits from throughout the numerous Gundam universes in a crossover storyline.Story ModePrevious modes such as Free mode and Official mode have been replaced by Story mode. Story mode allows the player to choose different missions based on a gundam character's story line. There are several different types of missions the player can choose in story mode.Story ChapterMissions relating to the story of the pilot chosen.RelationshipA series of missions that allows the player to build relationships/friendships with other Gundam pilots.FriendshipMissions where a variety of pilots will appear as your ally.HistoryMissions that reenact events from the Original Gundam series.CollectionMissions where a variety of pilots will appear as your enemy. New Gundam plans can be obtained by playing these missions.ChallengeDifficult missions that tests the player's skill.TutorialSeries of tutorial missions for new players to get familiar with the game.MemorialMissions that commemorate the player's accomplishments. Different rewards can be obtained by playing these missions.SpecialMissions where upon completion awards the player with vast sums of money.Playable Mobile suitsMobile Suit GundamRX-78-2 Gundam (
